extent.charseq: Rich Yankees battle champion Phillies for title
the Yankees, now back in the World Series after a six-year absence
dethrone reigning champion Philadelphia on Wednesday in the 105th World Series
July's Major League Baseball All-Star Game
the most successful club in American pro sports history, have missed the playoffs only once in the past 15 seasons but the title drought has raised the stakes for the big-spending Yankees
the first National League champion to repeat since Cincinnati in 1976
Yankees closing relief pitcher Mariano Rivera of Panama
a 37-year-old ace southpaw pitcher who signed this year for 5.5 million dollars
the champs so we have to go take it from them
a playoff star for New York
